summary.span: 包含支持 Windows 窗体和 WPF 控件的互操作的类。

span.span: Contains classes that support interoperation of Windows Forms and WPF controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空间包含实现和技术之间的互操作的类 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 。The namespace contains classes that enable interoperation between the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies. 使用类时 ，可以 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] 在页面上承载控件 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] ，并在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] 基于的应用程序中承载元素。When you use classes, you can host [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controls on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] pages, and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elements in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based applications. 实现互操作功能的两个关键类是 和 。The two key classes that implement interoperation capabilities are and . 使用哪个类取决于您的控件实现：Which class you use depends on your control implementation: - 当必须使用页面上的控件时，请使用类 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 。Use the class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control on a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] page. - 当必须 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 在基于的应用程序中使用元素时，请使用类 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] 。Use the class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based application.
